spec_data.Name: python-copr-doc
spec_data.Description:
COPR is lightweight build system. It allows you to create new project in WebUI,
and submit new builds and COPR will create yum repository from latest builds.

This package includes documentation for python-copr. Mostly useful for
developers only.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 15 Sep 2017 08:20:18 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
